ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
A lightweight, dependency-free Python package for reading, processing,
and writing track row column (TRC) motion capture data. The TRCData
object behaves like a standard Python dictionary, providing simple,
direct access to all header metadata and time-series marker data.
about.summary: A package for reading track row column (TRC) motion capture data.

about.description:
A lightweight, dependency-free Python package for reading, processing,
and writing track row column (TRC) motion capture data. The TRCData
object behaves like a standard Python dictionary, providing simple,
direct access to all header metadata and time-series marker data.
about.summary: A package for reading track row column (TRC) motion capture data.

name: trc-data-reader
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "trc-data-reader" %}
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/hsorby/trc-data-reader/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c70c66b8b0f3d826834a217716648ea8c9002178e88befee16df8d287f501aef

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - poetry-core
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - c3d

test:
  imports:
    - trc
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/hsorby/trc-data-reader
  summary: 'A package for reading track row column (TRC) motion capture data.'
  description: |
    A lightweight, dependency-free Python package for reading, processing,
    and writing track row column (TRC) motion capture data. The TRCData
    object behaves like a standard Python dictionary, providing simple,
    direct access to all header metadata and time-series marker data.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/hsorby/trc-data-reader

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Ipuch
